name: Spirit River
description:
You arrive at a strange town, with no memory of how you got there. All you know, is that you are quite thoroughly, and completely, dead. Welcome to Spirit River, a place between life and the afterlife, where people who aren't quite ready to move on remain.

A Green Behind the Ears Game. 

The Team: BlobOfAwe, dihawk13, rth2 (dreams), furu, Kabungus, LILINA, Muirin, 

Credits and links to assets used can be found in the README document.

Source code can be found here:

https://github.com/tdawsondev/GameDev.TV-Jam-GreenBehindTheEars
